it.polimi.sw2019.controller

Class AtomicActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.controller.AtomicActions

  • public class AtomicActions
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    lentinip this class contains all the useful methods to modify the model

      AtomicActions(Match match, VirtualView view)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convertPowerup(Player owner, int powerupIndex)
      Adds one cube of ammo to the Ammo of the Player owner and than discards it
      void dealDamage(Player shooter, Player receiver, int damage)
      Deal a specific amount of damage to a Player, plus his marks.
      void drawPowerup(Player drawer)
      this method is used to add a powerup to the player and removing it from the powerups deck
      void grab(Player grabbingPlayer, Cell selectedCell)
      Moves the player to the selectedCell, performs the grab in a common Cell, adds the correct stuff to the Player and then discards the ammoTile.
      void grabWeapon(Player grabbingPlayer, Cell selectedCell, int weaponIndex)
      Performs the grab of a Weapon in a spawn Cell, adds it to the player and removes it from the cell (moves also the player)
      void grabWeaponAndReplace(Player grabbingPlayer, Cell selectedCell, int cellWeaponIndex, int playerWeaponIndex)
      Performs the grab of a Weapon in a SpawnCell when the Player needs to replace one of his weapons (moves also the player)

      method to assign mark to players
      void move(Player player, Cell selectedCell)
      Changes the Player position to a specific Cell
      void move(Player player, Cell selectedCell, boolean damageSession)
      this second move was made for moveAfterShoot, to know in the action report if we are in damage session

      Removes a cost from the Player

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(Player player,
                 Cell selectedCell)
        Changes the Player position to a specific Cell
        Parameters:
        player - the Player that is going to move
        selectedCell - destination Cell

      • move

        public void move(Player player,
                 Cell selectedCell,
                 boolean damageSession)
        this second move was made for moveAfterShoot, to know in the action report if we are in damage session
        Parameters:
        player - player who is moving
        selectedCell - destination
        damageSession - if we are in damage session

      • grab

        public void grab(Player grabbingPlayer,
                 Cell selectedCell)
        Moves the player to the selectedCell, performs the grab in a common Cell, adds the correct stuff to the Player and then discards the ammoTile. The cell at the end of the method is empty and with Ammo = null.
        Parameters:
        grabbingPlayer - the grabbing Player
        selectedCell - the selected common Cell

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon(Player grabbingPlayer,
                       Cell selectedCell,
                       int weaponIndex)
        Performs the grab of a Weapon in a spawn Cell, adds it to the player and removes it from the cell (moves also the player)
        Parameters:
        grabbingPlayer - the grabbing Player
        selectedCell - the selected spawn Cell
        weaponIndex - the weapon index in the spawn Cell

      • grabWeaponAndReplace

        public void grabWeaponAndReplace(Player grabbingPlayer,
                                 Cell selectedCell,
                                 int cellWeaponIndex,
                                 int playerWeaponIndex)
        Performs the grab of a Weapon in a SpawnCell when the Player needs to replace one of his weapons (moves also the player)
        Parameters:
        grabbingPlayer - the grabbing Player
        selectedCell - the selected spawn Cell
        cellWeaponIndex - the weapon index in the spawn Cell
        playerWeaponIndex - the weapon index in the Player

      • dealDamage

        public void dealDamage(Player shooter,
                       Player receiver,
                       int damage)
        Deal a specific amount of damage to a Player, plus his marks. Also changes the receiver's state and sets if he's dead.
        Parameters:
        shooter - Player who shoots
        receiver - Player who receives the damage
        damage - Number of tokens that the shooter gives

      • mark

        public void mark(Player shooter,
                 Player receiver,
                 int mark)
        method to assign mark to players
        Parameters:
        shooter - who give marks
        receiver - who receives marks
        mark - number of marks given

      • reload

        public void reload(Player reloader,
                   Weapon reloadedWeapon)
        method to reload a weapon
        Parameters:
        reloader - who reloads
        reloadedWeapon - weapon reloaded

      • convertPowerup

        public void convertPowerup(Player owner,
                           int powerupIndex)
        Adds one cube of ammo to the Ammo of the Player owner and than discards it
        Parameters:
        owner - Player owner of the powerup
        powerupIndex - index of the powerup in the Powerups of Player

      • payAmmo

        public void payAmmo(Player owner,
                    Ammo cost)
        Removes a cost from the Player
        Parameters:
        owner - Player
        cost - Ammo that is going to be removed

      • payAmmoWithPowerups

        public void payAmmoWithPowerups(Player owner,
                                Ammo cost,
                                java.util.List<Powerup> powerups)
        Removes a cost from the Player's Ammo using also Powerups
        Parameters:
        owner - Player
        cost - Ammo that is going to be removed
        powerups - List of Powerup used to pay a cost

      • drawPowerup

        public void drawPowerup(Player drawer)
        this method is used to add a powerup to the player and removing it from the powerups deck
        Parameters:
        drawer - who draws
